description: The current king of Roland. Born of a Noble and a lowly commoner. He was shunned and hated by his half brothers. Vowed at a young age to become king so he can fix this corrupted world. A tactical genius and perfectly willing to make sacrifices so the greater good can be accomplished, even if the method is often extreme. Well loved by his people and his servants, considers Ryner to be his best friend. Is torn by the knowledge that sooner or later he must kill Ryner to secure his kingdom from within. Secretly authorize the constant surveillance on all of Ryners`s activities and conducts inhumane medical experiments on other bearers of Alpha Stigma and other types of "cursed" eyes to harness their powers as weapons. Is hinted to be the reincarnation of one of the The legendary Heroes that is spoken of in the old stories.
name: Sion Astal
